title: Construction Organization and Planning
overview: This course introduces the general technology of construction, covering all works and items necessary to build a complete project, from foundation, body to completion. It also covers methods to establish construction schedules to ensure timely and high-quality completion of projects.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Understanding of construction organization and planning
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will understand the basics of construction organization and planning and its application in real-world scenarios.
Students will be able to apply construction technology in practical situations.
Students will develop project management skills, including decision-making, planning, and execution.
